Apartment B2.description: A cramped apartment with boarded windows and scattered debris. The air smells of mold and decay.

Hallway.description: A dimly lit hallway with flickering overhead lights. Doors line both sides, most are locked or barricaded.

Stairwell.description: A concrete stairwell echoing with distant sounds. Graffiti covers the walls and the air is thick with dust.

Ground Floor.description: The building's entrance area. Sunlight streams through cracked windows, illuminating the abandoned lobby.
